Frontend application with pages for property listings, property details, and search/filter interface
Backend API server exposing endpoints for property data retrieval and search functionality
Database connection to PostgreSQL using environment variables: DB_HOST, DB_PORT, DB_USERNAME, DB_PASSWORD, DB_NAME
Property listing page displaying multiple property summaries with key details
Property detail page showing comprehensive information for individual properties
Search functionality allowing users to find properties by keywords or specific criteria
Filtering capability to narrow down property listings by attributes such as price range, location, property type, bedrooms, bathrooms, and square footage
Responsive design ensuring usability across desktop and mobile devices
Consistent styling with alice blue background color and steel blue applied to all UI elements
Navigation menu enabling seamless movement between main sections of the website
Pagination or infinite scrolling mechanism for browsing large sets of property listings
Interactive map component displaying property locations (if geospatial data is available)
User session management for potential future features like favorites or saved searches
Loading states and error handling for API requests and data fetching operations
Package.json configuration with scripts: install:all to setup both frontend and backend dependencies, dev to start both servers concurrently
